title: Stage Lv5-A3-S09
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The introduction highlights the importance of the research problem. (academic variant 1)
Gaps in existing research necessitate new exploration. (academic variant 1)
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 서론에서 연구 문제의 중요성을 부각시킵니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The introduction highlights the importance of the research problem. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 기존 연구의 공백이 새로운 탐구를 필요로 합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Gaps in existing research necessitate new exploration. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이론적 토대를 구축하기 위한 연구가 시급합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Research to establish theoretical foundations appears to be urgent. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 현상에 대한 체계적 이해가 부족한 상황입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: There appears to be a lack of systematic understanding of the phenomenon. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 학술적 논의를 발전시키기 위한 연구입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: This appears to be research to advance academic discourse. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 실증적 검증이 이론 발전에 필수적입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Empirical verification appears to be essential for theoretical development. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 복합적 문제에 대한 다각적 접근이 요구됩니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: A multi-faceted approach to complex problems appears to be required. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구 문제가 학계의 관심을 집중시키고 있습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The research problem appears to be attracting academic attention. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이론과 실무 간의 괴리를 해소할 필요가 있습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: There appears to be a need to bridge the gap between theory and practice. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 새로운 관점에서 기존 이론을 재검토합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: We re-examine existing theories from a new perspective. (academic variant 1)

sentences.en: The introduction highlights the importance of the research problem. (academic variant 2)
